item.value: After patent and invoice will create row in billing_history
After payment user will see thanks page in payment iframe and will be updated and biling_next_payment_date will be changed according to biling_type.

Member will see payment screen Members will change billing cycles - users.biling_type will be updated immediately and users will see different prices. Iframe will display credit card info will be displayed.
After the end of call with Client, Members will receive a sms with a link to the offer edit and will be able to close the offer so the system will not send the offer to additional clients.

Approved member will be able to publish the offer based on max number of offers he can publish setted by Admin https://app.moqups.com/y56VfcXulX/view/page/acb3c9d4e On offer publish screen Member will be able to click on statistics and see requests statistics graph for selected area based on room he selected https://app.moqups.com/y56VfcXulX/view/page/af2c64888

After the Member finishes adding the rooms he will see a page explaining to him what his profile is waiting for approval by Admin. After Admin will approve the Member - Member will get email with note what he can continue and publish the offers.
And will be able to continue and create room/s.
After registration, Members will see a page with an explanation of the process.
A notification about the registration of a new Member will be sent to Admin and Admin will be able to set the Member as active.

Indicates what transaction will be performed by the MPI and setup the hosted page transaction accordingly.A regular sale is AutoCommFor tokenization only use 'Token'.For authorization only on a two phase sale use ‘Verify’for reverse tokenization (when enabled) use 'CardNo', for other transaction type refer to "validation" tag XML API documentation
Success transaction
Cancel of transaction
Return of transaction

Transaction Query7.1An additional feature CG Gateway offers is querying the gateway for the full transaction details.7.2The can be optionally implemented by the merchant.7.3Of course, the query is using the same CG Gateway HTTPS Post or Web service mechanism, using the following XML to perform the transaction.7.4The query result include the transaction details that was approved by the end user/buyer.7.5Note that the query result will end with a general error (transaction ID was not found) as long as the transactionhasn’t completed(or in other words –as long as the buyerdid not approve the transaction in the payment page).

I receive this parameter in response to a request for auctions / getAuctionInfo. And what is he responsible for? and what can you do with it?
Я получаю этот параметр в ответ на запрос auctions/getAuctionInfo. И за что он отвечает? и что с ним можно сделать?
some Code

Information about auctions (time, date, info etc) is stored both on bidspirit and on the auction house’s server. It will be managed manually in both environments. For convenience, there are 2 APIs which can be called from the server (auctions/getAllAuctions, auctions/getAuctionInfo) to synchronize the auction info.
Or I have a link to a oldid version of the documentation. Could you help me clarify this point?
